overview: A teenage boy reluctantly turns to the streets to earn $6,000 a month for his mother's cancer medicine and quickly discovers that street money does not come easy. When an old family friend makes him a syndicate boss, jealousy and greed immediately turn his friends against him. With pressure mounting from all sides, he must choose between saving his motherâ€™s life and saving his own.
tagline: Sometimes good people have to do bad things.
title: Noble Intentions
